executive_summary.key_finding: Orchestrator 10-minute probe cycle deployed per CEO-DIR-2026-024 - FjordHQ transitions from episodic execution to continuous perception
executive_summary.market_impact: System now 'breathes' every 10 minutes, detecting regime changes and market anomalies within 600 seconds (vs 900 seconds baseline)
executive_summary.recommendation: Evidence Unification Daemon deployment next (within 4 hours) to complete cognitive 'ignition key'
executive_summary.risk: LOW - Observation-only mode, no parameter mutations during 30-day Phase 5 lock

configuration_change.description: Reduced from 15 minutes to 10 minutes per CEO-DIR-2026-024

continuous_perception_architecture.operational_mode: OBSERVATION ONLY - no parameter mutations during 30-day window
continuous_perception_architecture.output: Continuous stream of market state observations logged to evidence_nodes

cnrp_integration.causal_chain: R1 (Evidence) → R2 (Alpha Graph) → R3 (Data Hygiene) → R4 (Epistemic Integrity)

command_line_usage.description: Run with CNRP scheduling (4-hour full cycles + 10-minute R4 probes)
command_line_usage.recommendation: Deploy as Windows Service or systemd daemon for 24/7 operation

detection_latency_improvement.so_what: Captures intraday market shifts 5 minutes earlier - critical for volatile markets

system_awareness_frequency.so_what: Higher granularity market state monitoring - reduces blind spots

resource_utilization.cpu_impact: Minimal - R4 probe is lightweight integrity check
resource_utilization.database_impact: Moderate - 2 additional log entries per hour
resource_utilization.cost_impact: Negligible - R4 is read-only query, no API calls

30_day_phase_5_lock.requirement: NO parameter mutations during observation window (Day 8-38)
30_day_phase_5_lock.enforcement: Vision autonomy circuit breaker halts on unauthorized parameter change

observation_only_mode.requirement: 10-minute probes detect regime changes but do NOT trigger parameter updates
observation_only_mode.enforcement: R4 logs observations to evidence_nodes, downstream mutation logic disabled
observation_only_mode.validation: No entries in parameter_mutation_log during observation window

ttl_validation.requirement: All DecisionPlans have valid_until timestamp enforced before execution
ttl_validation.enforcement: ios003_daily_regime_update checks TTL, expires stale plans
ttl_validation.validation: No executions on beliefs older than 4 hours (CNRP cycle limit)

uptime_target.validation: Count(timestamps) >= 144 per day (6 per hour * 24 hours)

detection_accuracy.target: >90% of regime shifts detected within 600 seconds

false_positive_rate.target: <5% false positives (no actual regime shift within 4 hours)
false_positive_rate.measurement: Count(alerts without confirmed regime change) / Count(total alerts)

day_9.purpose: Ensure all evidence artifacts include lineage_hash for tamper detection

governance_validation.requirement: All orchestrator actions logged to governance_actions_log
No unauthorized API calls or parameter mutations

mantra_alignment.eliminate_noise: 10-minute probes detect regime changes without false positives (30-day calibration validates signal quality)
mantra_alignment.generate_signal: Continuous perception converts raw market observations into actionable intelligence (evidence_nodes population)
mantra_alignment.move_fast_and_verify_things: Rapid detection (10 min) + deterministic verification (hash-bound evidence chain)

stig_certification.statement: I, STIG (CTO), certify that the Orchestrator 10-minute probe cycle has been deployed per CEO-DIR-2026-024 Step 1 (Continuous Perception). Configuration change: CNRP_R4_INTERVAL_SECONDS updated from 900 to 600 seconds. Governance constraints enforced: observation-only mode, 30-day Phase 5 lock, TTL validation. Success metrics defined: >99% uptime, >90% detection accuracy, <5% false positives. Evidence Unification Daemon ready for deployment within 4 hours to complete cognitive 'ignition key'. FjordHQ transitions from episodic execution to continuous learning - system now 'breathes' every 10 minutes.
stig_certification.mantra: Eliminate Noise. Generate Signal. Move fast and verify things.
